com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators

Interface TextReplacer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiacriticRemover, LowercaseFilter, LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter, LowercaseKnownWordFilter, QuoteNormaliser, UppercaseSeriesFilter

    public interface TextReplacer
    Within a list of tokens, replaces tokens with alternate text for analysis. Must neither add nor remove any tokens from the list.
    Must have a no-parameter constructor.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void replace(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokens)

      • replace
